title: Did Dia de los Mortos and the Day of the National Anniversary of Americans killed by "illegal aliens" on the same day?
subtitle: The President of the United States, Donald Trump, made a proclamation called Nov 1 National Day to commemorate those killed by "illicit aliens."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: United States President Donald Trump signed a declaration declaring 1 November on the same Mexican holiday as Dia de los Mortos, the national day of remembrance of Americans killed by illegal aliens.
